level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: ยง 17-356 Definitions. As used in this subchapter, the following terms shall be defined as follows: a. "Tattoo" means any mark on the body of a person made with indelible ink or pigments injected beneath the outer layer of the skin, or to make such a mark. b. "Tattooist" means any person who applies a tattoo to the body of another person.
